segments.text: I see the overflowing sink, water streaming everywhere, and it makes me feel unsettled.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a mess that could easily be avoided if only she would pay attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the kids are so focused on their cookie venture, they seem oblivious to the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They have this innocence that’s sweet, yet it’s wrapped in mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about the potential hazards lurking in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s funny how a single moment can feel so chaotic yet mundane.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside world looks inviting, almost dismissive of the mess we're in.
segments.speaker: PAR
